alert.note: Alert for Georgetown; Horry (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Tornado Watch issued January 04 at 1:39PM EST until January 04 at 5:00PM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: TORNADO WATCH 14 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 5 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN NORTH CAROLINA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 5 COUNTIES IN SOUTHEAST NORTH CAROLINA BLADEN BRUNSWICK COLUMBUS NEW HANOVER PENDER IN SOUTH CAROLINA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 2 COUNTIES IN NORTHEAST SOUTH CAROLINA GEORGETOWN HORRY THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF ANDREWS, BLADENBORO, BOILING SPRING LAKES, BURGAW, CHADBOURN, CONWAY, ELIZABETHTOWN, GARDEN CITY, GEORGETOWN, LAKE WACCAMAW, LELAND, LITTLE RIVER, LONG BEACH, MURRELLS INLET, MYRTLE BEACH, NORTH MYRTLE BEACH, OAK ISLAND, RED HILL, SOCASTEE, SOUTHPORT, SUNSET BEACH, SURF CITY, TABOR CITY, WHITEVILLE, AND WILMINGTON.
